name: Advisor Performance
description: This dashboard displays the performance of financial advisors, showing key metrics such as assets under management, number of assets and clients, pipeline duration, and time in stage.  It also highlights at-risk assets.

kpis.name: Assets Under Management
kpis.description: Total assets under management for the selected advisor, Bernelle Weatherhead;  £6.2M

kpis.name: Number of Assets
kpis.description: Total number of assets managed by Bernelle Weatherhead; 18

kpis.name: Number of Clients
kpis.description: Total number of clients for Bernelle Weatherhead; 11

kpis.name: Average Pipeline Duration
kpis.description: Average duration of assets in the pipeline for Bernelle Weatherhead; 39.3 days

kpis.name: Average Time in Stage
kpis.description: Average time spent in each stage of the pipeline for Bernelle Weatherhead; 7.5 days

kpis.name: SLA Completion
kpis.description: Percentage of Service Level Agreements (SLAs) completed; 84.6% complete, 15.4% incomplete.

name: ABC Corp Finance Dashboard
description: This dashboard provides a financial overview of ABC Corp, showing key performance indicators (KPIs) such as sales, profit margin, and discounts across different segments and regions.

kpis.name: Profit Margin %
kpis.description: The current profit margin is -35%.

kpis.name: Profit Growth
kpis.description: Profit growth is -6%.

kpis.name: Profit $
kpis.description: Total profit in dollars is 15,824.

kpis.name: Sales Growth
kpis.description: Sales growth is 10%.

kpis.name: Sales
kpis.description: Total sales are 143,796.

kpis.name: Discount %
kpis.description: Overall discount percentage is 21%.

kpis.name: Discount $
kpis.description: Overall discount in dollars is 198,837.

kpis.name: Ach %
kpis.description: Achievement percentage is 109%.

kpis.name: Target

name: HR Attrition Dashboard
description: This dashboard visualizes HR attrition data, providing insights into attrition rates, employee satisfaction, and demographics to identify contributing factors.

kpis.name: Total Attrition
kpis.description: The total number of employees who have left the company (1,233)

kpis.name: Attrition Rate
kpis.description: The percentage of employees who left the company, relative to total employees (16.1%)

kpis.name: Staff Satisfaction
kpis.description: Average staff satisfaction score on a scale (2.8 / 4.0)

name: Sales Leadership Dashboard
description: This dashboard provides a regional overview of sales performance, including key metrics such as year-over-year (YoY) sales by department and average customer spend.

kpis.name: YoY Sales By Department
kpis.description: Average customer spending over time, showing values for each month across different regions.  For example, in the West region, average spending ranged from approximately $663 to $760.

kpis.name: Average Customer Spend By Region
kpis.description: Average customer spending per region, showing monthly sales data. For instance, the West region shows sales ranging from approximately $0.59M to $1.65M over the year.

kpis.name: Product Performance (Top 5 Products) By Region
kpis.description: Sales performance of top 5 products across regions, shown for 2013 and 2014. Sales values range from roughly $1.08M to $5.00M.

name: October 2022 Toy Store Sales Overview
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of October 2022 sales performance for the toy store, including key metrics such as total sales, cost of goods sold, profit margin, and profit, broken down by category and location.

kpis.name: Sales
kpis.description: Total sales for October 2022, showing a 16.38% increase compared to the previous month.  ($130,659)

kpis.name: Cost of Goods Sold (COGS)
kpis.description: Total cost of goods sold for October 2022, showing a 16.85% increase compared to the previous month. ($93,592)

kpis.name: Profit Margin
kpis.description: Overall profit margin for October 2022, showing a decrease of 0.29% compared to the previous month. (28.37%)

kpis.name: Profit
kpis.description: Total profit for October 2022, showing a 15.21% increase compared to the previous month. ($37,067)

kpis.name: Average Daily Sales
kpis.description: Average daily sales for October 2022. ($4,215)

kpis.name: Average Daily Profit
kpis.description: Average daily profit for October 2022. ($1,195.71)
